Meteor.GameEngine

Class Meteor

  • java.lang.Object
    • Meteor.GameEngine.Meteor
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable, Cortex

    public abstract class Meteor
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Runnable, Cortex
    Meteor is the main game engine class.
    This class should be used as an extension to make, making games easier.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Meteor

        public Meteor(java.lang.String gameTitle,
              java.lang.String gameVersion,
              int gameWidth,
              int gameRatio,
              int gameScale)
        Creates the game engine instance.
        Parameters:
        gameTitle - The title of the game.
        gameVersion - The version of the game.
        gameWidth - The width of the game window.
        gameRatio - The aspect ratio of the game window based on the gameWidth.
        gameScale - The scale of the game window.

      • Meteor

        public Meteor(GameWindow window,
              java.lang.String gameVersion)
        Creates the game engine instance.
        Parameters:
        window - The window object or gameWindow of the game.
        gameVersion - The version of the game.
